item.title: This hat should be America’s national dress
item.description: Everyone is dressing as Americans. This calls for action.

item.description: The Trump administration is rescinding temporary protected status for 350,000 of them on Feb. 3.

item.title: Is college worth it? This quiz shows the reality.
item.description: Views on the importance of higher education have fallen sharply in recent years.

item.title: Action-taking AI is speeding ahead. Let’s get some guardrails up.

item.title: Seizing Maduro? Quick. Fixing Venezuela’s oil production? Years.

item.title: The 20 best things Trump did in 2025

item.title: ‘This is not regime change’: María Corina Machado’s message to Americans
item.description: The Nobel Peace Prize winner discusses her Freedom Manifesto and whether Venezuela can move beyond dictatorship.
